mapper.select: select C.*,D.id as cityId,D.`name` as cityName,D.`name_en` as cityNameEn, D.`name_pinyin` as cityNamePinyin,E.id as cId,E.`name` as cName,E.`name_en` as cNameEn,E.`name_pinyin` as cNamePinyin from ( select A.*,B.`file_url`,B.`file_name` from visa A left join file B on A.id = B.type_id ) C left join region_data D ON C.country = D.id left join region_data E on C.continent = E.id where C.country = #{countryId}
